Strings.Text: {scroll 2}A power connection switch...\nThe elevator power is off...{clear 0}Will you connect it?{branch 0 6 1}
{scroll 2}I've got to get power to\nthe elevator...{scroll 2}
{scroll 2}The power for the elevator\nis activated as the power{clear 0}supply and the circuit\nhave been connected...{scroll 2}
{scroll 2}A power connection switch.\nNo power to some areas.{clear 0}{scroll 2}The voltage is incorrect.\nAdjust the wiring?{branch 0 6 1}
{scroll 2}A power regulator... I\nreally should keep moving.{scroll 2}
{scroll 2}Place 2 wires. When all\ngraphs extend into the red...{clear 0}{scroll 2}...the electricity\nwill be powered on.
